remarks: Membership of a subtraction mapping in a Euclidean space.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Jul-2013.)
statement:
eleesub.1 $e |- C = ( i e. ( 1 ... N ) |-> ( ( A ` i ) - ( B ` i ) ) ) $.
eleesub $p |- ( ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) ) -> C e. ( EE ` N ) ) $.
$d A i $.
$d B i $.
$d N i $.
